languages.text: {n}Девушка испуганно опускает глаза и поджимает губы.{/n} "Я... Мне просто жалко его, мил{mf|орд|еди}".
{n}Terrified, she drops her gaze and purses her lips.{/n} "I... I just pity him, my {mf|lord|lady}."
languages.original_text: {n}Девушка испуганно опускает глаза и поджимает губы.{/n} "Я... Мне просто жалко его, мил{mf|орд|еди}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Scared, she drops her gaze and purses her lips.{/n} "I... I just pity him, my {mf|lord|lady}."

{n}Terrified, she drops her gaze and purses her lips.{/n} "I... I just pity him, my {mf|lord|lady}."

languages.text: {n}年轻女子被吓坏了。她垂下眼帘，抿起了嘴。{/n}“我……我仅仅是同情他而已，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Terrified, she drops her gaze and purses her lips.{/n} "I... I just pity him, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}年轻女子被吓坏了。她垂下眼帘，抿起了嘴。{/n}“我……我仅仅是同情他而已，大人。”

languages.text: {n}恐怖にかられた彼女は視線を落とし、唇をきゅっと引き結んだ。{/n}「わ…私ただ、あの人が哀れに思えただけなのです、天の{mf|君|姫}」
languages.original_text: {n}Terrified, she drops her gaze and purses her lips.{/n} "I... I just pity him, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}恐怖にかられた彼女は視線を落とし、唇をきゅっと引き結んだ。{/n}「わ…私ただ、あの人が哀れに思えただけなのです、天の{mf|君|姫}」

languages.text: {n}Aterrorizada, la muchacha baja la mirada y aprieta los labios.{/n} «Yo... es que me da pena, {mf|milord|milady}».
languages.original_text: {n}Terrified, she drops her gaze and purses her lips.{/n} "I... I just pity him, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aterrorizada, la muchacha baja la mirada y aprieta los labios.{/n} «Yo... es que me da pena, {mf|milord|milady}».

languages.text: {n}Dehşete düşmüş bir hâlde bakışlarını indirip dudaklarını büzüyor.{/n} "Ben... Ona acıyorum {mf|lordum|leydim}."
languages.original_text: {n}Terrified, she drops her gaze and purses her lips.{/n} "I... I just pity him, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dehşete düşmüş bir hâlde bakışlarını indirip dudaklarını büzüyor.{/n} "Ben... Ona acıyorum {mf|lordum|leydim}."

languages.text: {n}Terrifiée, elle baisse les yeux et pince les lèvres.{/n} « Il... il me fait pitié, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Terrified, she drops her gaze and purses her lips.{/n} "I... I just pity him, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Terrifiée, elle baisse les yeux et pince les lèvres.{/n} « Il... il me fait pitié, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. »

languages.text: {n}Sie senkt verängstigt den Blick und schürzt die Lippen.{/n} "Ich ... Ich habe lediglich Mitleid mit ihm, {mf|Herr|Herrin}."
languages.original_text: {n}Terrified, she drops her gaze and purses her lips.{/n} "I... I just pity him, my {mf|lord|lady}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie senkt verängstigt den Blick und schürzt die Lippen.{/n} "Ich ... Ich habe lediglich Mitleid mit ihm, {mf|Herr|Herrin}."
